longBusinessSummary: PCS Edventures!, Inc. provides experiential and hands-on K-12 science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) education products and curriculum in the United States. The company offers out-of-school programming, such as after-school, military education, home-schooling, summer, and corporate outreach programs; and professional development training for instructors. It also offers enrichment programs for the informal learning market, which include Rockin' Robots, Ready, Set, Drone!, Cubelets BOT Builder, Simple Machines, Drone Designers, Coding with Drones, Pirate Camp, Dir Camp, and Claymation programs, as well as Traveling Artist; Unleash Your Wild Side, Build a Better World; Oceanic Exploration; Pirate; and Flight and Aerodynamics programs. In addition, the company provides discover series products for the makerspace environment comprising Discover Engineering, Discover Robotics & Physics, Discover Robotics & Programming, and Discover STEM; BrickLAB products for the grade school market; and STEAMventures BUILD activity book for the K-3 market. Further, it offers Discover drones; add-on drone packages; and ala carte drone items, which includes spare parts. The company serves schools and school districts through reseller channels, direct sales, partner networks, and web-based channels. PCS Edventures!, Inc. was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Boise, Idaho.
